> except, you know. his W and his R passive do Magic damage and tend to make up 30-50% of his damage sometimes...

30-50% is impossible unless you build ap (which is not that viable anyway)  w is often paired with his Q if you do so(at max rank both) 56% of the damage will be physical (Q 230dmg + W 180dmg = 410, 230/410 = ~56%( this number get higher the more bonus ad Jax gets) 
 
If you don't pair it with your Q that mean you use it to reset your auto attack which mean 2 basic attack. let's say you are lvl 9 (the lvl which w is maxed out)  jax has 85 ad  ( so 85*2 (each hit)(170) + 180 = 350, 170/350 48%)

For his R, at lvl 6 jax has 75 ad, if every 3 hit he does 100 magic he still does more physical ( 75*3(physical) + 100magic = 325 dmg, 325/225 69% physical.

 at lvl 16 jax has 111 ad, if every 3 hit he does 225 magic he still does more physical (111*3(physical)(333) + 225magic = 558 dmg, 333/5585 59% physical.

 if you really build 0 ad has 0 ad runes  Q and e as little as you can you will do about 50% magical which no one does end game jax has about 225 which is about what the magic damage of his R every third hit and he can do his w the 2 other hit let say at best , he w every third hit for 225  jax still does 3*225(physical)(675) + 2*225(magical)(450) = 1125, 675/1125 0.6 or 60%. so his magical reach 40% if he can  W every third hit(which your cd wont allow) and he NEVER Q or E and doesn't have titanic hydra or deadman plate( which is  a must have on jax), and always attack in 3 hits. 


In my experience, a normal build for jax does betwenne  20-25% magical (looking at my damage in the after-match lobby) so no Magic pen on jax is bad only 25% of the damage will benefits from it

AS I said ap Jax is not viable,  buying 150 ap is weaker than 60 ad,
let's say you land 9 hit,
you have Wx2 Rx3 Qx1 Ex1 9AA, which is realistic fo the cooldown giving you . 390% ap scaling(330% are magical dmg and 60% are physical) and 1050% ad scaling (all of it is physical)

The ap will give you 495 extra magical damage and 90 extra physical damage(total:585)
The ad will give you 630 extra physical damage.

Also for his magic damage to surpasses his physical damage he need about 120 ap(considering he is lvl 18 and only have base ad)(i can give you the math if you want).In many way AD Jax is stronger than ap Jax. That's why ap jax isn't viable. You can still win even have a decent win ration if you get good at ap Jax  but never as good as ad jax would have been.

That's why i do not recommend to build m.pen because it mean that you are building him wrong. If he really looks to have a good build AD is the way. 

If he asked if he should, mostly because he wants to know if it is viable or a good choice, which i gave you the math that proove isnt a good idea.

mpen is ok but there is currently no mpen item worth building on jax unless for some reason magic damage is your only damage

However this implies that there is a champ that jax cannot beat to death in a reasonable amount of time because of armor or something, this too is not realistic
